DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of pregabalin in patients with partial seizures.
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate the Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of Pregabalin in Patients With Partial Seizures.
DOC.criteria: Must have met the inclusion criteria for preceding doubleblind study Have received doubleblind study medication and wish to receive openlabel pregabalin. Cannot have absence seizures
